name: Unicorn 3D Art: Puzzle Games
description:
Do you LOVE Unicorns? From the creators of Unicorn Chef, we bring you our newest UNICORN 3D! Create beautiful low polygon 3D art that combines color by number, with pixel art and of course with unicorns!

HOW TO PLAY?
- Select one of the Arts (I suggest unicorn one!)
- Place the jigsaw pieces by their numbers or shapes.
- DONE!
*Don’t forget to SHARE your work on Facebook and Instagram!

KEY FEATURES:
- Tons of amazing Jigsaw Low-Poly puzzles designed and crafted by our unicorn-loving designers, updated weekly.
- Only the jigsaw pieces needed in the display area will be shown, making life so much easier.
- Share it after it's done, it looks amazing!
- Girls, Kids, Safe.
- Very good value. Free content and some premium content for those that want over 30 new arts a month!
*Jigsaw Low-Poly also helps children develop better hand-eye coordination and recognition.
